snippet: If the pope can quit, Catholics can, too.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Paul Eli suggests American Catholics give up Catholicism for Lent and seize opportunity to examine truth of the faith; contends, in light of Pope Benedict XVI's resignation, that change in church can happen, and brief reprieve from church may allow faithful to consider what else about faith can be changed.
lead_paragraph: If the pope can quit, Catholics can, too.

headline.seo: If the Pope Can Quit, Catholics Can, Too
headline.main: Give Up Your Pew for Lent
headline.print_headline: Give Up Your Pew for Lent
